name: TeamOnThree
tag_list: sports-websites, teams, coaches, athletes, players, team-websites, sports
description: A tool for competitive sports teams
overview:
TeamOnThree is a website for competitive sports teams. This sports website allows coaches to manage their team, communicate with players, and handle administrative tasks that pile up throughout the season.

Membership is free, and the website offers a number of free tools coaches can use to save time and energy. By joining, coaches can create a team website, manage their practice plans online, send text messages to their players, build a sports playbook, and enter their team’s statistics for each game played.

Although TeamOnThree is based in the United States, it is used by coaches all over the world and has members from over 100 different countries or territories.
